result.reason: Right Shift not recognized via Chrome Remote Desktop is likely a CRD keyboard remapping limitation, but needs confirmation whether the issue is specific to mRemoteNG or all apps through CRD, and which protocol is affected (RDP/VNC/SSH).
result.approach: Confirm if CRD-specific or mRemoteNG keyboard hook issue; if mRemoteNG, investigate keyboard event handling in protocol layer to ensure right-shift scancode is forwarded correctly.
